hint: Apply safe, proven optimizations: push filters early into CTEs, convert implicit joins to explicit joins, and prefetch selective dimension tables to reduce base fact table volumes.
Restructure CTEs for better plan control: isolate date ranges into explicit CTEs, materialize filtered dimension subsets, and push correlated subquery filters into main CTE definitions.
Precompute and materialize all filtered dimension/fact subsets before main query execution, and eliminate duplicate fact table scans by reusing pre-aggregated CTEs across union branches.
Transform query structure radically: convert OR-implied UNION branches to explicit disjoint UNION ALL, replace IN-subqueries with EXISTS semi-joins, and flatten nested aggregations.
